channel.title: Eating Food doesn't heal
channel.description:
When ever I eat it wont heal me if the healing goes past my max level... such as if I am at 98 hp and I eat a shark the shark dissapears from my inventory but I don't even get 2 hp out of it.. I stay 98 hp.
How do I fix this?

item.title: Eating Food doesn't heal
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

public void buryItem(int item, int slot) { if (duelRule[7] && inDuel && duelFight) { sendMessage("Food has been disabled for this duel"); return; } boolean used = true; if (playerHasItem(item)) { switch (item) { case 526: prayerMessage(70); break; case 532: prayerMessage(115); break; case 3125: prayerMessage(300); break; case 536: prayerMessage(450); break; case 315: setAnimation(0x33D); animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750; currentHealth += 5; if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints]) currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; sendMessage("You eat the shrimps"); break; case 379: setAnimation(0x33D); animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750; currentHealth += 12; if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints]) currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; sendMessage("You eat the lobster"); break; case 385: setAnimation(0x33D); animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750; currentHealth += 25; if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints]) currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; sendMessage("You eat the Shark!"); break; }

That’s mine

Read full topic

case 315: setAnimation(0x33D); animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 750; currentHealth += 5; if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints]) currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; sendMessage("You eat the shrimps"); break;[/quote]

item.title: Eating Food doesn't heal
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

probably in your eating method, it won’t heal if the food will make your hitpoints level become higher then the total level. you just have to make it so that it will eat even if that happens, and then lower the hp down to max hp if it goes over

Read full topic
